name: crokodial-crm
description: Crokodial CRM - Professional Lead Management System

scripts.dev: echo 'Please run "npm run dev:server" and "npm run dev:client" in separate terminals.'
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json dialer-app/*/node_modules dialer-app/*/package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.reset: npm run kill-ports && npm run clean
scripts.test: npm run test:client && npm run test:server
scripts.lint: npm run lint:client && npm run lint:server
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:client && npm run lint:fix:server
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:client && npm run type-check:server
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd dialer-app/client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.ci:servers: concurrently -k -s first -n SERVER,CLIENT "npm run start:server" "npm run start:client"
scripts.postbuild: echo '=== SERVER BUILD OUTPUT DIAGNOSIS ===' && echo 'Checking dialer-app/server/dist/:' && ls -la dialer-app/server/dist/ 2>/dev/null || echo 'dist/ directory not found' && echo 'Checking for index.js:' && ls -la dialer-app/server/dist/index.js 2>/dev/null || echo 'index.js not found' && echo '=== END DIAGNOSIS ==='

author: Crokodial CRM Team
